Project description

Music Assistant

Music Assistant

Python library for managing online and offline music sources and orchestrate playback to devices.

This library has been created mainly for the Home Assistant Integration but can be used stand-alone as well in other projects.See the examples folder for some simple code samples or have a look at the Home Assistant Integration for discovering the full potential.
